revised_title: Investigating the Phosphorescent Spectra of SS and Europium
tldr: The author examines the phosphorescent spectra of SS and Europium, discovering that the strong phosphorescent line in Europium is not identical to the anomalous line in SS. The addition of lime to pure Europium causes the line to shift further away from the position it occupies in mixtures of Yt, Sm, and Eu.
